mapper.insert: insert into point_withdraw (user_no, point, reg_date) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{request_point}, #{reg_date})
mapper.select: select withdraw_no, point, status, reg_date, read_check from point_withdraw WHERE user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY reg_date DESC, withdraw_no DESC LIMIT 10

SET @RegDate = (select reg_date from point_withdraw WHERE withdraw_no = #{last_index}); select withdraw_no, point, status, reg_date, read_check from point_withdraw WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND (reg_date < @RegDate OR (reg_date = @RegDate AND withdraw_no < #{last_index})) ORDER BY reg_date DESC, withdraw_no DESC LIMIT 10
select IF(EXISTS(select * from point_withdraw WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND read_check = false), TRUE, FALSE);
